actions.command: age_of_exile stat give @s exact ranged_dmg GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe1 8 8
age_of_exile stat give @s exact armor FLAT origin_aoe2 -20 -20
age_of_exile stat give @s exact critical_damage FLAT origin_aoe3 15 15
age_of_exile stat give @s exact physical_weapon_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe4 -10 -10
age_of_exile stat give @s exact faster_projectiles FLAT origin_aoe5 20 20
age_of_exile stat give @s exact accuracy GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe6 7 7

name: 능력치
description:
§f원거리 무기 피해량§r,§6치명피해§r가 늘어나고, 방어력이 감소합니다.
§f§l특수 능력치 : 투사체 속도 +20%
